entry.title: Open Design Engine - Support #36: Research how Redmine uses RMagick
entry.content:
• Status changed from New to In Progress
  • % Done changed from 0 to 30

According to the install documentation RMagick is used to enable png export of the Gantt charts (ODE currently supports pdf export of Gantt charts). Here are some instructions for installing RMagick. Probably want to wait to do this on the new server.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Support #36: Research how Redmine uses RMagick
entry.content: Should also check with Littlelines since this involves a required gem. And should look Bitnami docs to see if this is supposed to be there or is present in the latest version of their Redmine stack.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Support #36: Research how Redmine uses RMagick
entry.content:
• Target version changed from v0.2 - Public Beta to v0.2.1 - Public Beta Enhancements

Moving to v0.2.1.
